events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking number isn’t updating, and I’m worried it’s lost or delayed indefinitely.
The issue has been labelled as a delivery delay based on customer's report of missing and stagnant tracking updates for their order.
The support case was assigned to agent Emily Johnson specializing in shipping and logistics inquiries.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. Let me help you check the status right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID shown in your confirmation email? This will help me investigate further.
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the tracking ID is XYZ987654321. According to the courier website, the last update was over 10 days ago.
Thanks for the info. I’ve contacted the courier and escalated your case for urgent handling. Meanwhile, I can offer you a voucher for your next purchase as an apology for the inconvenience.
I appreciate you taking action so quickly and the voucher offer sounds good. Hopefully, the package turns up soon.
The courier confirmed your package will be delivered today. Please let us know if you do not receive it by end of day, and we will assist further.
Just checking in to confirm you received your order and the delivery issue has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Thank you for your patience. As the delivery has been completed and you have received compensation, we are closing this case now.
